long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The LeadSimple Chrome extension is a browser extension for Chrome that allows you to track and log your emails sent from Gmail and use some of the LeadSimple Inbox tools directly in your inbox. You can view contact information, properties associated with the contact, and see other email records including those sent by other shared inboxes directly from your Gmail.
